title: The next manufacturing revolution is here
description: Economic growth has been slowing for the past 50 years, but relief might come from an unexpected place -- a new form of manufacturing that is neither what you thought it was nor where you thought it was. Industrial systems thinker Olivier Scalabre details how a fourth manufacturing revolution will produce a macroeconomic shift and boost employment, productivity and growth.
author: Olivier Scalabre
keywords: TED, talks, business, economics, engineering, industrial design, global development, innovation, product design, work, technology, manufacturing, 3D printing
